竈字的基本解释

竈
zào
见“灶”。

竈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zào］
［《廣韻》則到切，去号，精。］
“造3”的被通假字。“灶1”的繁体字。亦作“灶1”。
(1)砖石或其他材料制成的一种设备。供烹饪、冶炼、烘焙等用。
(2)指灶神。
(3)古代一种熏烟御敌的军事设置。
(4)指灶户。煮盐户。
(5)喻指家产。
(6)见“跨竈”。
(7)通“造”。古祭名。

竈字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　竈； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页869第26
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?則到切，音躁。【說文】炊竈也。亦作窖。【釋名】竈，造也，造創食物也。【博雅】?謂之竈，其脣謂之陘，其窻謂之突，突下謂之甄。【禮·月令】孟夏祀竈。【蔡邕·獨斷】夏爲太陽，其氣長養，祀之於竈，在廟門外之東，先席於門奧西東，設主於竈陘。【淮南子·汜論訓】炎帝作火官，死而爲竈神。【莊子·達生篇】竈有髻。【註】髻竈神，著赤衣，狀如美女。【後漢·隂興傳】隂子方，臘日晨炊而竈神形見，因以黃羊祀之。【雜五行書】竈神名禪，字子郭。　又【字彙補】與造通。【周禮·春官】大祝掌六祈，二曰造。【註】造，故書作竈。杜子春讀爲造次之造。

kitchen
Basic explanation of words
kitchen
zào
See "Stove".
kitchen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zào］
["Guangyun" is the cut, the number, and the fine. ]
The false word "made 3" was passed. The traditional characters of "炉1". Also known as "Stove 1".
(1) A device made of masonry or other materials. For cooking, smelting, baking, etc.
(2) Refers to the Kitchen God.
(3) An ancient military setting that smoked the enemy.
(4) Refers to stove households. Boil salt households.
(5) Yu refers to family property.
(6) See "Cross stove".
(7) Through "making". Ancient sacrifice name.
kitchen
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Acupoint Word Department] 　 Zhan; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 869 26
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Then it is cut, the sound is irritable. 【Said the text】Cooking stove too. Also used as cellar. [Release name] Stove, make, make food. [Bo Ya]? It is called the stove, its lips are called the gate, its squat is called the sudden, and the sudden next is called the Zhen. 【Rite·Moon Order】Meng Xia worships the stove. [Cai Yong·Arbitrary] Xia is the sun, its qi grows up, and it is dedicated to the stove. It sits at the east of the temple gate and sits at the east side of the gate, and the master is at the stove. [Huainanzi·Fun Lun Xun] Emperor Yan became the fire officer, and died as the kitchen god. [Zhuangzi·Dasheng Chapter] The stove has a bun. [Note] The kitchen god in a bun, dressed in red, looks like a beautiful woman. [Later Han·Yin Xing Biography] Yin Zi Fang, cooks on the last morning and the kitchen god is seen, because it is worshipped with yellow sheep. 【Miscellaneous Five Elements Book】The name of the kitchen god is Zen, with the character Zi Guo.　[Word Supplement] and Zao Tong. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan】Blessed palms and six prayers, and the second is creation. [Note] Made, so the book is the stove. Du Zichun reads as making the next.
